uv22:3: sādhu śrutaṁ sucaritaṁ sādhu cāpy aniketatā ।
uv22:7: bālā ihāvijānantaś caranti hy amarā iva ।
uv22:11: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ praviśya tamasā sphuṭam ।
uv22:13: vidyamānāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣmāṁ hi na paśyati ।।
uv22:15: tahaiveha naro nityaṁ jñānavān api yo bhavet ।
uv22:19: pradīpena tu rūpāṇi cakṣuṣmāṁ paśyate yathā ।
uv22:23: śrutvā dharmāṁ vijānāti śrutvā pāpaṁ na sevate ।
uv22:25: śrutvā hy anarthaṁ varjayate śrutvā prāpnoti nirvṛtim ।।
uv22:27: bahuśruto ’pi ced bhavati śīleṣu tv asamāhitaḥ ।
uv22:29: śīlatas taṁ vigarhanti nāsya saṁpadyate śrutam ।।
uv22:33: śīlatas taṁ praśaṁsanti tasya saṁpadyate śrutam ।।
uv22:35: alpaśruto ’pi ced bhavati śīleṣu tv asamāhitaḥ ।
uv22:37: ubhayatas taṁ vigarhanti nāsya saṁpadyate vratam ।।
uv22:41: ubhayatas taṁ praśaṁsanti tasya saṁpadyate vratam ।।
uv22:45: niṣkaṁ jāmbunadasyaiva kas taṁ ninditum arhati ।।
uv22:47: ye me rūpeṇa minvanti ye me ghoṣeṇa cānvagāḥ ।
uv22:49: chandarāgavaśopetā na māṁ jānanti te janāḥ ।। [i]
uv22:51: ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṁ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca ।
uv22:53: chandarāgavaśopetā na māṁ jānanti te janāḥ ।। [ii]
uv22:55: ādhyātmaṁ ca na jānāti bahirdhā tu vipaśyati ।
uv22:57: bahirdāphaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22:59: ādhyātmaṁ tu prajānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati ।
uv22:61: ādhyātmaphaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22:63: ādhyātmaṁ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati ।
uv22:65: ubhaye ’phaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22:67: ādhyātmaṁ ca prajānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati ।
uv22:69: sa tu niḥsaraṇaprajño na vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22:71: bahu śṛṇoti śrotreṇa bahū paśyati cakṣuṣā ।
uv22:73: na tad dṛṣṭaṁ śrutaṁ dhīraḥ sarvaṁ śraddhātum arhati ।। [i]
uv22:75: śrotreṇa śrūyate bahu dṛśyate bahu cakṣuṣā ।
uv22:77: na tad dṛṣṭaṁ śrutaṁ dhīraḥ sarvaṁ śraddhātum arhati ।। [ii]
uv22:87: dharme tu ye hy āryanivedite ratās
